play.jobs
Class Job<V>

java.lang.Object
  play.Invoker.Invocation
      play.jobs.Job<V>
Type Parameters:
V - The job result type (if any)
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Callable<V>
public class Job<V>
extends Invoker.Invocation
implements Callable<V>

A job is an asynchronously executed unit of work
